daily_take.headline: Maine Democrats are betting big on Platner to take on Collins.
daily_take.deck: Graham Platner's odds to clinch the Democratic Senate nomination in Maine jumped 9 points overnight to 76.5%, signaling traders think he's locked in the primary. The $1.1M in volume suggests serious money has decided this race is his to lose. If he clears this hurdle, he faces the brutal task of unseating Olympian Susan Collins.
